title: Fewer fancy hats but even more rapid fire

replies.body: MAKE IT PERMANENT (at least in customs so you can like 5v5 with friends)
Yes make it permanent in customs pls :3
I don't see why they can't leave it just fro custom games :(
yess that would be amazing
Nah it would then start to get boring...........lol it's better that it comes once a year just to keep it interesting
If this comment gets 100 likes riot we get urf back{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
trolling for likes!

Everyone is saying it should be permanent, but I was reading the YouTube comments on a video and found someone very good idea. URF is actually too fun to make it permanent so maybe you could have like Ultra Rapif Fridays.
A whole new meaning of URF. Or Ultra Rapid Weekends. Just not permanent but dont make us wait a whole year.
Genius.

i agree on Ultra Rapid Fridays But if they do they have to at least do it every fortnight
not every week
PLEASE RIOT THIS IS THE BEST IDEA I HAVE HEARD EVEN WE DONT NEED TRIBUNAL GIVE US THIS
They could even make it somewhat like ARAM, so that everyone gets random champions as to picking all the OP champs.
Even if they don't make it permanent, the option to have it in custom games would be nice.{{summoner:31}}
It isn't too fun, it's how a ARTS/MOBA/Whatever should be

Oh no it's too fun... Quick remove it cause it might make the normal game feel boring!

Doesn't that mean the normal game actually is boring? I don't know... Confusing subject?!
MAKE IT PERMANENT!!! PUT A VOTING POLL {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
aye

Dont you guys see, the think that makes urf urf is that its only available for a short period of time, think about it, if it was permanant u would get bored of it pretty quickly, plus isnt exciting each year to discover what the new  champions can do in urf because those new champs wernt out last year?
i would like urf to become permanent
but it makes more sense not to be
I would never get bored of playing this beautiful gamemode... do you get bored of normals or ranked?

I feel the same way, but in addition, there are some champions that are just overpowered compared to others just in this mode. They were originally created accounting the fact that they'd be played in normal circumstances (like Kassadin not being able to spam his already low cd ult constantly because of its increasing mana cost), and the fact that champions have been adjusted just for this mode. If URF were to remain permanent, then League would divulge into two separate games, and Riot would have to split their resources in maintaining both of them at the same time. Overall, both modes would suffer greatly.

Doesn't explain why we can't have Dominion, though.
I agree 100%

I wouldn't get bored of this. No way.

See, this is the game I want to be playing. I don't want to play an online game and spend most of hit hitting creeps before I get to have fun blasting people and dodging ults, I want to be blasting people all game.

It reminds me of Quake 3 and Quake 3 is how a game should be.

That or EU IV. Grand strategy or blast 'em up, no exceptions.
booooooooooring. Keep the mode... I stopped playing league this much... then I found URF... Sparked it back to life for me...

Just keep it for customs, would be cool to have, or maybe next time it comes out allow hexakill urf or tt urf, maybe aram urf. There's plenty to be done. This is obviously a loved game mode and you can't keep bringing it back every year, things have to evolve, doesn't mean this can't join the team.

Please do not make this permanent. If this was permanent, all the other games wouldn't be played and the true league of legends gamemode would be lost. URF is a treat, like chocolate. One or two chocolates can be heaven, but too many will make you sick. If URF was permanent, it would take over all other gamemodes and league would just revolve around URF forever. It'll get boring after a while and everything is out of balance. Riot would have to nerf and buff champs and other things just for URF to make it fair and balanced. 

PLEASE don't make this permanent. URF is a treat that you have once in a while, not every day.
It would definitely revolve around URF, because who wants to play an online game and spend most of it hitting stupid creeps? The "true LoL gamemode" is in Dota 2.

It's going away {{champion:32}}  {{item:3070}} 
750/750
Riot, can we please make URF permanent ?? I'm in love with this mode ..
MAKE IT PERMANENT!{{champion:32}} {{summoner:3}} {{item:3151}}
MAKE IN PERMANENT PLEASSSE
The Robots have taken me. Please send help.

Please make it permanent everyone loves U.R.F. I just spent literally 8 hours straight playing U.R.F and U.R.F hide and seek. We will be ever in your debt if you do this. This is a plea I'm sure will be shared by all of OCE
Make it permanent. I haven't seen enough {{champion:120}} yet.

Am i the only one that dose not like URF i think it is so infuriating and its just the same champions im versing over and over again. IMO its not as fun as everybody is calming it too be. plus the fact that every game i have been in my team mates have told me that im shit and should uninstall.

Your teammates don't usually rage at you? o.O

That's part of the LoL experience. You need to truly hate yourself to play this. :P

I've seen a few champions, actually I've seen every champion so far and most of them do pretty well. Bursty assassins do well of course, but a Cait sitting up the back popping people with headshots is hilarious.
MAKE IT PERMANENT PLEASE!!! IT IS MUCH LESS BORING THAN THE USUAL GAME!!
*cough* permanent *cough* … do it
MAKE IT PERMANENT
We are just oce they wont listen but if riot does make URF PERMA PLEASE

URF Doom Bots... wouldnt that be something

I reckon a new game mode could be Doombots 2, where it's 6 players take on 120+ bots at once, ofc the bots would be nerfed like have .5 of every stat. that means that there would be 1 player per 20 bots. i think that would be actual mayhem.
